body_html: @SsnL If I got it right, do you mean Transformer to be the model in paper 'Attention Is All You Need' or it is actually an upcoming PyTorch module for building RNN architecture :) ? In that case, maybe I would like to wait for it before submitting a PR to contrib.
body_text: @SsnL If I got it right, do you mean Transformer to be the model in paper 'Attention Is All You Need' or it is actually an upcoming PyTorch module for building RNN architecture :) ? In that case, maybe I would like to wait for it before submitting a PR to contrib.
body: @SsnL If I got it right, do you mean Transformer to be the model in paper 'Attention Is All You Need' or it is actually an upcoming PyTorch module for building RNN architecture :) ? In that case, maybe I would like to wait for it before submitting a PR to contrib.
